name: Team 19: Light of Pelor- The Mystical Adventures of Sapphire, The Naïve
name_original: Team 19: Light of Pelor- The Mystical Adventures of Sapphire, The Naïve
description:
Welcome to Burley, a town who's milk supply keeps being stolen buy a dragon. Play as Sapphire, a naïve witch whose  mission is to take the milk back.  Fight goblins with spells and traverse tricky paths to reach his evil lair.

(Recommended being played at full screen)
